document_data.name: Snake
document_data.mainbody: '''Snakes''' or '''serpents''' were reptilian animals that had no legs. Any snake that managed to live for a particularly long time was referred to as an '''elder serpent'''.
document_data.Behavior: While the majority of snakes possessed a basic animal-level of intellect, many believed that they grew wiser and more cunning with age, with those referred to as "elder serpents" believed to possess a semi- or low-intellect. Elder serpents were said to fearless in the face of fire, hoarders of [[gem]]s, such as [[Midani]] in the case of [[Zakhara]]n serpents.
document_data.Significance: Hordes of snakes were seen as a sign of favor from [[Gargauth]], the Lost Lord of the Pit.{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|11}}

Species.Adder: A venomous snake found in the [[Duskwood]].
Species.[[Asp]]: A common species of venomous snake.
Species.[[Black mamba]]: A very aggressive snake that could grow to over {{SI|14|ft|long=yes}} in length.{{Cite dragon/237/The Dragon's Bestiary: Venomous!|45}}
Species.[[Boomslang]]: A small and docile snake with a very dangerous bite.{{Cite dragon/237/The Dragon's Bestiary: Venomous!|45-46}}
Species.[[Bushmaster]]: A powerful form of viper.{{Cite dragon/237/The Dragon's Bestiary: Venomous!|43}}
Species.[[Cobra]]: A venomous snake with an expandable hood near the neck.{{Cite dragon/237/The Dragon's Bestiary: Venomous!|46}}
Species.[[Constrictor]]: Large, powerful snakes that used their bodies to wrap around and crush their prey.<ref>
Species.[[Fer-de-lance]]: A formidable, aggressive type of pit viper.{{Cite dragon/237/The Dragon's Bestiary: Venomous!|43-44}}
Species.[[Gaboon]]: A large-fanged viper that blended with its jungle environment.{{Cite dragon/237/The Dragon's Bestiary: Venomous!|44}}
Species.[[Glacier snake]]: An insatiable reptile with brown fur, ripping teeth, and a bone-tipped stinger at the tail.
Species.[[Jit snake]]: A large dangerous and venomous snake that dwelled in [[Cormanthor]].
Species.[[King cobra]]: A very large cobra that could reach up to {{SI|18|ft|long=yes}} in length.
Species.Mushroom snake: A large, non-venomous snake with a mottled skin that blended well with the fungi in the hills surrounding [[Delzimmer]] in [[southeast Faerûn]]. Its primary diet was insects and it was hunted to make [[scaletail]], a local delicacy.
Species.[[Nightviper]]: A venomous snake of the [[Nelanther Isles]]. А poison called [[Nightviper venom]] was extracted from its fangs.{{Cite dragon/293/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Missing Minotaur|75}}
Species.[[Sea snake]]: Immense vipers that lived in bodies of water.
Species.[[Viper]]: A common type of venomous snake that came in various sizes and colorings.
Species.[[Water moccasin]]: A common species of venomous snake.
Species.[[White-furred snake]]: A warm-blooded constrictor snake found in cold regions.
